ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in years at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Sex of the subject, assgined at birth
Reflects html that contains the instructions and stimuli that is displayed on the screen throughout the experiment
The keyboard key pressed for each response
Reflects the jsPsych plugin used to disply stimuli and collect responses throughout the experiment.
Reflects the index of each object displayed in the experiment.
Reflects the time elasped at the onset of each object.
A string identifier for the current timeline node.
Reflects if the block is practice or the experiment.
Reflects the number of responses within each block.

Notes: The practice block is denoted using -1.

ElementDescription: Reflects the trial number across the experimental blocks.
Site ID for where data was collected.
